content_text: Atoms are the basic building blocks of matter. Everything in the universe is made of atoms.
A simplified representation of an atom.

graph TD
    A[Observation] --> B[Question]
    B --> C[Hypothesis]
    C --> D[Experiment]
    D --> E{Analyze Data}
    E -- Supports Hypothesis --> F[Conclusion]
    E -- Rejects Hypothesis --> G[Refine Hypothesis]
    G --> D
